呢條題目出黎係同學生講，教科書 (e.g. longman) 入面話indirect tax一定只shift SRAS, direct tax一定只shift AD係唔正確。所以題目比左以下condition:
An increase in sales tax rates may reduce firms’ willingness to supply goods and services, as well as their willingness to invest.

Reduce firms’ willingness to supply goods and services: change in SRAS
Willingness to invest: change in AD

如果再考既，睇下題目有無好specific既hints，跟番題目做。
無hints既相信只係shift SRAS都會比分 (呢個係最direct 既effect)
如果你shift埋 AD既一定要係verbal 個part寫番清楚。
